content.title: Mukhyamantri Sports Development Scheme - Retired Person
content.department: Directorate of Youth Affairs & Sports, Government of Tripura
content.details: Launched on 9th February 2024, the 'Mukhyamantri Sports Development Scheme-Retired Person' aims to generate employment opportunities (Gymnastics, Swimming) for retired persons (Senior Physical Instructors) to give a monthly fixed remuneration of ₹30,000/-. The contract is tenable for a maximum period of 6 months, it may be extended or curtailed (The total period of engagement of consultants shall not exceed 5 years or 64 years of age whichever is earlier).
eligibility: The applicant should be a resident of Tripura.
The applicant should be a retired sportsperson.
The applicant's age should be less than 64 years.
content.application_process: Offline. The interested applicant should take print of the prescribed format of the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields, paste the passport-sized photograph, and attach copies of all the mandatory documents. Submit the duly filled and signed application form along with the documents to the Director of Youth Affairs & Sports, Government of Tripura, Shiksha Bhavan, 4th Floor, Office Lane, Agartala, Pin-799001.
documents_required: Fitness certificate (Issued by Agartala Government Medical College Tripura).
Good record in service career and integrity certificate (Issued by the competent authority).

faqs.question: What is the monthly remuneration for retired sportspersons under the Mukhyamantri Sports Development Scheme-Retired Person?
faqs.answer: The monthly remuneration for retired sportspersons under the Mukhyamantri Sports Development Scheme-Retired Person is ₹30,000.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply for the Gymnastic and Swimming discipline under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Eligible applicants for the Gymnastic and Swimming discipline under the scheme include retired sportspersons.

faqs.question: How long is the contract period for consultants under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The contract period for consultants under the scheme is a maximum of 6 months, with the possibility of extension.

faqs.question: Can applicants from outside Tripura apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only residents of Tripura are eligible to apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: Is there any age limit for applicants under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicants under the scheme should be below 64 years of age.

faqs.question: Are applications submitted via email or post accepted?
faqs.answer: No, applications sent via email or post are not accepted.

faqs.question: Will applicants receive any travel allowance for the interview?
faqs.answer: No travel allowance or conveyance allowance is provided for the interview.

faqs.question: What is the mode of assessment for candidates under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Candidates are required to appear for a viva-voice/oral assessment.

faqs.question: How does the remuneration differ between the Gymnastics and Swimming disciplines?
faqs.answer: The remuneration is the same for both Gymnastics and Swimming disciplines, at ₹30,000 per month.

faqs.question: How many positions are available for the Swimming discipline under the scheme?
faqs.answer: There are two positions available for the Swimming discipline under the scheme.
